0100111000001111 0001110110110101 1 -> sum: 0110101111000101, cout: 0
0010001100000010 0010001111101001 1 -> sum: 0100011011101100, cout: 0
0110000110110011 1110010000010100 0 -> sum: 0100010111000111, cout: 1

1000010010010000 1111110001110000 1 -> sum: 1000000100000001, cout: 1

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
